original: 14.22. Cittaduka🔽Cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: cittaduka  cittam dhammam paṭicca nocittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  no cittam dhammam paṭicca na no cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: The Pairs Section🔽With mind as condition, a phenomenon not associated with mind arises … (one result).🔽With a phenomenon not associated with mind as condition, a phenomenon not associated with mind arises … (three results).

original: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
analyzed: cittam ca no cittam ca dhammam paṭicca no cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With mind and with a phenomenon not associated with mind as condition, a phenomenon not associated with mind arises … (one result).
